title: My Father's Son (CRS124)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Byron Bowers first shared on the podcast in November of 2015 about his differences with his old man.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Byron Bowers, Kevin Allison)
